name: modeller
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who makes models as a job or hobby : He was an outstanding modeller of bronze heads of famous people. Experienced modellers will have no trouble building this aircraft from the plans.
someone who makes calculations or predictions (= statements about what might happen in the future) based on models (= simple descriptions of systems or processes): The numerical modellers can determine the chemical and physical interactions between drug and target. Have climate modellers factored in the impact of an increase in ocean area on climate?
More examplesFewer examplesModellers usually build their aircraft from kits.A team of computer graphics modellers created an accurate three-dimensional model of the luxury liner.The projections made by the modellers include such factors.They are neither statisticians nor observational scientists - they are computer modellers.
